title: Empowering Women through Cooking
description: Empowering Women through Cooking - Jordan is a project that includes the stories and Middle Eastern recipes of fifty four women, who live in Jordan and come from different national backgrounds, religions, socio-economics levels, talents, and struggles.This project is a validation that civil society, public sector, private sector, academia, impact funds, and aid agencies can (and must) work together on empowering women.Part of the proceeds go to Feeding All proudly supports the UN WorldFood Programme and Tkyiet Um Ali.
author: Seven Circles
